FlowDefinition: <<<<<<< HEAD <<<<<<< HEAD 2 NICC-063040: Sends an email to the Project Manager of a Project where the related Opportunity has had the Target HRM Org field updated. ======= 5 NICC-063040 - When the Target HRM Org field is updated on an Opp, an email alert will trigger to send an email to the Project Manager on any related Projects. >>>>>>> be8f81a97d079e6e4c45f805d88969f9bcae9d8a ======= 5 NICC-063040 - When the Target HRM Org field is updated on an Opp, an email alert will trigger to send an email to the Project Manager on any related Projects. >>>>>>> be8f81a97d079e6e4c45f805d88969f9bcae9d8a Notify PM that Target HRM Org field updated on Opp
